item.title: Bendy and the Ink Machine coming to PS5, Xbox Series in late Q2 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/bendy-and-the-ink-machine-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-in-late-q2-2025

  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Explore the ruined halls of Joey Drew Studios once again.

Publisher Silver Lining Interactive and developer Joey Drew Studios will release PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions of horror game Bendy and the Ink Machine at the end of Q2 2025, the companies announced. It will be available digitally for both platforms, as well as physically for PlayStation 5.

Bendy and the Ink Machine first launched for PC via Steam on February 10, 2017, followed by PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Switch on November 20, 2018, and iOS and Android on December 21, 2018.

Here is an overview of the game, via Joey Drew Studios:

About

Welcome back to the workshop.

Once the lead animator during Joey Drew Studios’ golden age, Henry thought his days drawing cartoons were long behind him. But decades later, a cryptic invitation pulls him back to the dilapidated studio… and into a twisted world of living ink, broken memories, and something that should’ve stayed forgotten.

Step into Henry’s shoes as he explores the ruined halls of a once-beloved animation empire now overrun with nightmares. Every corner hides a secret. Every hallway echoes with something unnatural. And Bendy… well, Bendy’s waiting.

Key Features

  • A Haunted Cartoon Hellscape – Ink drips from the ceilings. Walls groan with memories. This isn’t the studio you remember. Discover a richly drawn world oozing with dread and discover the disturbing secrets behind its smiling mascot.
  • Puzzle, Action… Terror – Balance exploration, clever puzzle-solving, and terrifying chase sequences in a game that constantly shifts under your feet. You’ll need your wits and your courage to survive.
  • A Soundtrack from the Shadows – This physical release includes a code to download the game’s chilling score, composed to echo through your nightmares long after the game ends.
  • You’re Never Alone – Friends? Enemies? In this place, they often wear the same face. Watch your back, and the walls!

item.title: Eternal Strands free DLC ‘Stargazer’ launches April 15
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/eternal-strands-free-dlc-stargazer-launches-april-15

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Featuring new Epic creature designed with Yusuke Mogi.

Yellow Brick Games will release Eternal Strands free downloadable content “Stargazer” on April 15, the developer announced.

The update will add new weapon recipes, a new armor set, a new Epic creature designed with Square Enix Creative Studio III concept artist Yusuke Mogi, a new map, a new power, new quests, a new dyeing system, an inventory and safe pouch size increase, improved combat and movement, and story mode difficulty.

Eternal Strands is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

item.title: Shotgun Cop Man launches May 1
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/shotgun-cop-man-launches-may-1

  • PC
  • Switch

Side-scrolling precision platformer dated.

Side-scrolling precision platformer Shotgun Cop Man will launch for Switch and PC via Steam on May 1 for $9.99, publisher Devolver Digital and developer DeadToast Entertainment announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Blast your way through hell in Shotgun Cop Man, a precision platformer where your weapons are your wings.

Embark on a mission to arrest Satan armed with a devastating arsenal and a relentless thirst for glory. Propel yourself through hordes of irritable demons, devious traps, and thrilling challenges using the only two things you can trust: your wits and your weapons.

Conquer the handcrafted campaign or dive into user-generated levels in this fire and brimstone-fueled mission to serve justice.

Key Features

  • Firepower Propulsion – Master your movement through the twisted corners of hell as every shot propels you forward. Whether dodging enemies, scaling walls, or leaping impossible gaps, your weapons are the key to both survival and traversal.
  • Explosive Campaign and Challenges – Dive into an action-packed campaign in over 150 levels and face off against intense boss battles, then put yourself to the test and beat all the No Damage, Speedrun and Kill All challenges. Keep the infernal fun alive with an ever expanding choice of devious user-generated campaigns.
  • Create Your Own Hellish Playground – Let your creativity shine with the built-in level editor and Steam Workshop integration. Craft, share, and conquer custom levels to push the game and your peers to their limits.
